channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: On Good Soil
channel.desc: Jason Craig compares and contrasts modern suburban home life and the homestead, noting which lifestyle leads to families working together and which tends to drive families apart. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cat Chat
channel.desc: The Cat Chat family teaches us all about prayer, and how talking to God, and listening to Him, is very important to our spiritual lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: International Children?s Rosary
channel.desc: Experience the innocence and love children bring to Jesus and Our Lady in prayer as members of the Children?s Rosary prayer group lead the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Web Of Faith 2.0
channel.desc: Fathers Trigilio and Brighenti answer viewer emails concerning receiving Communion under the species of the Precious Blood, whether non-Catholics may receive Holy Communion, and why the Creed is said each Sunday. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: EWTN's limited series profiles St. Athanasius of Alexandria, the theologian and bishop who staunchly defended the divinity of Christ despite threats of exile and persecution. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Fr. Patrick Peyton
channel.desc: A look at the charismatic priest who pioneered the use of radio and TV to bring the rosary to the world, staging massive rallies and enlisting Hollywood celebrities in his singular mission. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Deacon Scott Carson, a former Episcopalian, shares what led him to the Catholic faith. Marcus Grodi hosts. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Albanie, Metano?a
channel.desc: Un pays, qui a connu l?une des dictatures communistes les plus fanatiques et ath?es, rena?t gr?ce ? la foi d?Albanais forts et d?vou?s. Aujourd?hui, le travail et le d?vouement des femmes consacr?es fournissent l??nergie vitale qui nourrit la vie de l??glise. ? M?tano?a ? pr?sente l?histoire inspirante de six religieuses qui partagent leurs exp?riences de missionnaires de la foi, ramenant l??vangile sur ces terres. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: We were made to live with God forever but we must choose to do so. Susan Conroy explains that our everyday lives determine where we will spend eternity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ghana : Conte De L?esprit Des Enfants
channel.desc: Dans le petit village de Sang au nord-est du Ghana, la s?ur Stan Mumuni a rencontr? une pratique qui condamne les enfants avec des handicaps physiques ? ?tre tu?s par leurs proches, accus?s d??tre maudits et mauvais. Elle a commenc? par en sauver un et au fil du temps, la ? Nazareth Home for God's Children ? (la Maison de Nazareth pour les enfants de Dieu) et la communaut? nouvellement ?tablie des S?urs mariales de l'Amour eucharistique ont accueilli et accueillent un nombre croissant d'enfants jug?s en danger de mort appartenant ? des familles craintives et superstitieuses. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Faith And Life
channel.desc: Sr. Jennifer from the Heart of Jesus became a Carmelite sister at the age of 24. She tells Campbell Miller about her spiritual journey to becoming a nun and adapting to a cloistered life in Spain?s Malaga Provence. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Deacon Scott Carson, a former Episcopalian, shares what led him to the Catholic faith. Marcus Grodi hosts. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! On Good Soil
channel.desc: Host Jason Craig describes how homesteaders participate in a natural economy and indicates St. Thomas Aquinas? warning against a false economy centered on wealth accumulation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The "reformation"
channel.desc: Experience the defining moments in Church history where the absolute truths of our Catholic faith revolutionized daily life in the fields of food production, architecture, science and more. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Two Marian apparitions in Rome are the subject of today?s investigation. One miracle leads to the building of St. Mary Major, and the other a dramatic conversion when an anti-Catholic Jew wears a Mary Miraculous Medal. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: Chris Stefanick presents the history of Franciscan University of Steubenville, and shows how it became a leader and model of Catholic Higher education. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Marie of Jesus Deluil-Martiny who founded a community of nuns that offer themselves for the sanctification of the clergy and religious. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about the corporal and spiritual works of mercy and how to live out these works in our daily lives. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: God's Blueprint For A Happy Life
channel.desc: Deacon Harold and Fr. Mullady discuss why it's so important to tell the truth, and explore the unexpected consequences of lying to make others happy or to avoid unpleasantness, awkwardness and pain. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Biblical Story Of The Mass
channel.desc: Tom and Fr. Wade talk about the remarkable story of Julian the Apostate and his divinely thwarted attempt to rebuild the Temple in Jerusalem. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Mitch presents Isaiah 36-39, known as the ?Deuteronomistic History,? one written at least 170 years after Isiah?s lifetime and also details his interaction with King Hezekiah. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Catholicism On Campus: The Students
channel.desc: From Mount St. Mary?s University, Msgr. Stuart Swetland fields the tough questions college students ask about the Faith, focusing here on politics. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Franciscan University Presents
channel.desc: Dr. Bob Rice offers positive ways to evangelize to modern young people, discussing what a successful youth ministry looks like and what the Gospels say about reaching the youth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Teresa Tomeo continues the discussion on the sacred spaces and fascinating places of Italy, a country with rich visual splendors and even deeper spiritual experiences. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. provides some insightful answers to questions Catholics are typically asked. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: To reveal the fatal flaws in Thomas Hobbes? philosophy, G.K. Chesterton pretends to convert to his materialistic way of thinking and beat him at his own game. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chesterton Station
channel.desc: Dressed as a detective, G.K. Chesterton awaits the arrival of author Robert Hugh Benson, who reveals that someone is following him, seeking to prevent Benson from having trust in God at the moment he needs it most. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Jim and Joy read comments and take calls about the graces available to be received during Eucharistic Adoration and Deacon Chuck Kelley calls in to share his thoughts and insights. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Forgive, With Immacul?e Ilibagiza
channel.desc: To heal from the scourge of alcoholism and wounds of domestic violence, Mardy and Audrey Jones must learn how to forgive themselves and each other. With additional insights from Fr. Thomas Berg and Dr. Timothy Lock. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Mark Mary Cristina explore the Holy Family's life before Jesus embarked on his mission. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the period of the Renaissance, occurring within in the 15th and 16th centuries. The "rebirth" of art in Italy was connected with the rediscovery of ancient philosophy, literature, and science and the evolution of empirical methods of study in these fields. Increased awareness of classical knowledge created a new resolve to learn by direct observation and study of the natural world. Consequently, secular themes became increasingly important to artists, and with the revived interest in antiquity came a new repertoire of subjects drawn from Greek and Roman history and mythology. The models provided by ancient buildings and works of art also inspired the development of new artistic techniques and the desire to re-create the forms and styles of classical art. Of special interest are the Vatican Library, Sistine Chapel and St. Peter's Basilica. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the Holy Spirit, discerning a religious order or diocesan priesthood, and the significance of destroying the ring of a deceased pope. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Melkite Church In America
channel.desc: Bishop John Elya explores the rich traditions and history of the Melkite Catholic Church in America. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: EWTN foundress Mother Angelica lends her valuable insight into the subject of conscience - why we have it, and what we do with it. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Matthew Bunson joins to expand upon Pope Leo XIV, his life, beliefs, and what the selection of his name might indicate about this impact on the Church and the world in general. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Walking Through Time: Catholic London
channel.desc: Joanna visits London Bridge, Shakespeare's Globe Theatre and where the ancient church of St. Mary Overie stood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! In Concert: 21st International Festival Of Sacred Music And Art Universal Vespers
channel.desc: Andrea Mannucci?s Universal Vespers, inspired by Pope Francis? 2020 prayer in an empty St. Peter?s Square. Directed by Claude Villaret at the Basilica of St. John Lateran in Rome. (45 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crux
channel.desc: Bishop Donald Hying encourages viewers to live in the quiet of the moment in order to better hear and understand God?s plan for their lives. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen emphasizes that the most intimate presence of God is in the Holy Eucharist. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Two Marian apparitions in Rome are the subject of today?s investigation. One miracle leads to the building of St. Mary Major, and the other a dramatic conversion when an anti-Catholic Jew wears a Mary Miraculous Medal. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: On Good Soil
channel.desc: Jason Craig explains from where the longing for rootedness and a sense of belonging stems and also explores how the homesteading movement can aid a family create lasting community. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Global Divine Mercy Chaplet
channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).
